races.race_description: Versatile and adaptable beings with balanced abilities. Humans excel at learning diverse skills and adapting to any situation, making them valuable allies in any party composition.
Hardy mountain folk known for their incredible toughness and craftsmanship. Dwarves are natural defenders with unmatched endurance and resistance to magical effects.
Graceful and mystical beings with deep connections to nature and magic. Elves possess keen senses and natural agility, excelling at ranged combat and magical arts.
Powerful and aggressive warriors driven by primal instincts. Orcs possess immense physical strength and natural ferocity, making them formidable opponents in direct combat.
